articles.title: Legal battle continues over H-1B $100,000 fee: Plea moved in appeals court
articles.description: The US Chamber of Commerce has decided to appeal a court ruling that allowed the Trump administration to move forward with a massive $100,000 fee on H-1B visa applications, Bloomberg reported. These visas are widely used by American technology companies to hire skilled foreign workers. | financialexpress.com

articles.title: Commentary: America and China’s Two
articles.description: Commentary: America and China’s Two-Track AI Race - Washington leads in core technology and innovation, but Beijing’s strengths in infrastructure and mass implementation could prove decisive in the long run
articles.content: Artificial intelligence is reshaping global industry and geopolitics, and the U.S. and China are its twin protagonists. From Washington’s AI Action Plan to Beijing’s comprehensive “AI+” strategy, both nations see artificial intelligence as the strate... [439 chars]

articles.title: Automatic train protection system Kavach commissioned on Bajwa-Ahmedabad route
articles.description: indian railways achieved a significant milestone in ensuring operational safety with the commissioning of the automatic train protection system kavach on the 96-km bajwa-ahmedabad section in western railway, a press note by the ministry said on monday. kavach is an indigenously developed automatic train protection (atp) system, which is a highly technology-intensive system. it helps loco pilots in running trains within specified speed limits by the automatic application of brakes in case they fail to do so.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
INDIAN Railways achieved a significant milestone in ensuring operational safety with the commissioning of the automatic train protection system Kavach on the 96-km Bajwa-Ahmedabad section in Western Railway, a press note by the ministry s... [1334 chars]

articles.title: Britain's Octopus Energy to spin out Kraken at $8.65 billion valuation
articles.description: Dec 29 (Reuters) - Britain's Octopus ‌Energy said on Monday it will spin off its technology arm, ‌Kraken, as an independent company valued at $8.65 billion, after a ‌funding round led by U.S. investment firm D1 Capital Partners.

Dec 29 (Reuters) - Britain's Octopus ‌Energy said on Monday it will spin off its technology arm, ‌Kraken, as an independent company valued at $8.65 billion, after a ‌funding round led by U.S. investment firm D1 Capital Partners.

articles.title: New Mexico secures $211 million federal funding for rural health care transformation
articles.description: New Mexico will receive $211.5 million in federal funding for rural healthcare across all 33 counties, supporting workforce recruitment, technology expansion, and strengthening hospitals serving as community lifelines.
articles.content:
New Mexico will get $211 million in federal dollars to support rural health care in 2026.
The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services announced $10 billion in awards for all 50 states through the new Rural Health Transformation Program on Monday, ... [3825 chars]

articles.title: Meta to acquire Chinese startup Manus to boost advanced AI features
articles.description: Meta said on Monday it would acquire Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus, as the technology giant accelerates efforts to integrate advanced AI across its platforms.
articles.content: Tech giants such as Meta have been ramping up AI investments through strategic acquisitions and talent hires as they navigate fierce industry competition. Earlier this year, the Facebook-owner invested in Scale AI in a deal valuing the data-labeling ... [831 chars]
